verbs.description: italian artichoke - green bean casserole [ARG0: my mother and i] [V: made] [ARG1: a few small changes to a recipe we found in a cookbook to create this comforting side dish] we increased the vegetable count and tossed in some seasonings to take the flavor up a notch it definitely not your average green bean casserole —denise klibert shreveport louisiana
